notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: E.A.R. conducted the experiments, extracted the RNA, prepared the cDNA libraries, performed the analyses, and wrote the manuscript. E.Y.R. and C.E.W. constructed the de novo transcriptome. C.E.W. conducted the GSEA analysis. K.R.Z., C.E.W. and M.W.S. helped to design the experiments and helped with the manuscript preparation.
